Introduction

Xiaoting is a Chinese singer and dancer.

In 2020, she took part in the survival show Chuang 2020, but was unfortunately eliminated after ranking 80th.

In 2021, Xiaoting participated in the MNET survival show Girls Planet 999, where she finished 9th place, securing her spot as a member of the South Korean project girl group Kep1er.

Xiaoting debuted as a member of Kep1er on January 3, 2022, with their first mini-album "First Impact" and the title track "WA DA DA."
